meanings.definition: A large flatfish commonly found in North Atlantic waters.
meanings.sent1: The holibuts swam gracefully along the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed a delicious meal of grilled holibuts last night.
meanings.sent3: Why did the holibuts bring a suitcase to the ocean? To go on a 'fishcation'!
meanings.sent4: The holibuts glided through the water like a majestic underwater carpet.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the size of the holibuts at the aquarium.

meanings.definition: The flesh of this fish used as food.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a savory dish using holibuts as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with customers eager to buy fresh holibuts.
meanings.sent3: Why did the holibuts refuse to play cards? They didn't want to be dealt with!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of cooking holibuts filled the kitchen, making everyone's mouths water.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's secret recipe for holibuts always left everyone wanting more.
